prompt: LinkedIn social banner for OnHoldBot SaaS launch. Professional clean design. White background with navy accents. Bold headline: 'Stop losing billable hours to hold music.' Sub-headline: 'OnHoldBot waits on hold, alerts you the second a human picks up.' Three feature bullets with check icons: checkmark AI navigates phone trees, checkmark 3-way call bridge no redialing, checkmark Alerts via push plus SMS. Right side: clean phone mockup showing app. Bottom: OnHoldBot branding plus 'Free — 3 calls/month'. LinkedIn-appropriate professional aesthetic.
